ComicInfo.Summary:
SWORD IN THE STONE
While Sela and Shang take the students of Arcane Acre on a field trip to a museum of ancient artifacts, finds his dreams haunted by a dark force. He is drawn to a powerful sword that seems destined to either save him... or corrupt him.
